title: KICK IT TOGETHER!
description: KICK IT TOGETHER is McDroll's 10 original crime/noir stories now together in one amazing edition! Read about Gemma Dixon, the young CID officer who doesn't stand for any nonsense from her male colleagues and can kick and punch her way out of any difficult situation.Drowning tells the story of a support for learning teacher who comes to the end of the road in more than one sense.McDroll writes about people on the edge, struggling to survive against the odds and the momentus decisions they have to take to survive.
author: McDroll
